We process this information in light of our legitimate interest in improving our Website and Services by enabling our users to browse in a secure environment.

If you wish to schedule a meeting with the End-User, we will collect your calendar data if you choose to provide it, to assist with scheduling a meeting.

If you wish to log-in to use the Services, we will collect your email address and selected password to enable you to log in to use the Services.

If you wish to submit an application to receive/use a Demo, we will collect your first and last name, phone number, email address to provide you with a Demo for the Services.
The information we collect in this manner typically includes your full name, email address and public information from your profile on these services.
